summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Dept.; providing for the improvement of Denny Way from Fairview Ave. North to Terry Ave. North, including certain regrading and installation of a mercury vapor lighting system on metal poles and placement underground of overhead wires, authorizing negotiation and compensation for property rights necessary therefor, making appropriations from the City Street Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund therefor, and superseding Ordinance 92667.
